issues.description: Some UI elements do not have sufficient color contrast
Front-end JavaScript libraries with known security vulnerabilities are detected
Some images displayed with incorrect aspect ratio
Some pages are missing meta descriptions

issues: Does not provide a valid manifest
Does not register a service worker

recommendations.title: Reduce JavaScript execution time
recommendations.description: Heavy JavaScript is blocking the main thread. Consider code-splitting and lazy loading non-critical components.
recommendations.implementation: Use dynamic imports for below-the-fold components and defer non-essential scripts.

recommendations.title: Fix color-contrast issue
recommendations.description: Some UI elements do not have sufficient color contrast
recommendations.implementation: Update the color palette in config.js to ensure all text meets WCAG AA contrast standards (4.5:1 for normal text).

recommendations.title: Fix label issue
recommendations.implementation: Add proper label elements or aria-label attributes to all form inputs.

recommendations.title: Add missing meta-description
recommendations.description: Some pages are missing meta descriptions
recommendations.implementation: Use the SEO component on all pages with appropriate metadata.

recommendations.title: Implement Progressive Web App features
recommendations.description: The site lacks PWA capabilities that could improve user experience and engagement.
recommendations.implementation: Add a web manifest, service worker, and appropriate icons to enable installation and offline support.
